item.title: [BASE]Npc Vs Npc[BASE]
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

I have been looking for tutorials about Npc Vs Npc
well no one bother to release anything about how to add it,so I think this might help the community.
I only release this because no one else will, and might never will.

[size=14pt][font=arial]NOTE: In some sources such as Allstar, the npcs would wander off and noclip, this is
because they are searching for another npc cba to explain further. [/font][/size]

NOTE2: This isn’t mine 100% I just rip the codes out of Dynasty.
Alright lets begin.

Title: Npc Vs Npc
Pros: use this for minigames
CONS:Only 1 npc can attack another npc, the one being attacked doesn’t retailate
Difficulty: about 3/10?
Purpose: To make the npc White Knight attack the void knight(Can be changed)
Note: When I had ripped this out, only 1 monster can attack it, but it can be modified to have more than 1 monster
[size=18pt]This is just a simple base, and do not flame please just trying to contribute to the community[/size]
Tested On: A Czar Server(Zaradomin-Scape, then I added onto DragzScape for testing both worked correctly)

1)Open Npc.java
and declare these ints

public boolean faceUpdateRequired; public int face; public boolean fighting = false; public int focusPointX, focusPointY; public int hitDiff2 = 0; public boolean hitUpdateRequired2 = false;
these ints are for the checking of if the monster is fighting and facing the monster

2)add these two methods

public void faceNPC(int i) { face = i; faceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; } 
public void gethurt(int amount) {
    if (hitUpdateRequired && !hitUpdateRequired2) {
        hitUpdateRequired = true;
        hitDiff2 = amount;
    }
    if (!hitUpdateRequired) {
        hitUpdateRequired = true;
        hitDiff = amount;
    }
    updateRequired = true;
    HP -= amount;
}</blockquote>

the gethurt method adds damage to the monster being attacked
the facenpc will explains itself, it makes the attacker faces the npc being attacked

3)Close and save NPC.java and Open NPCHandler.java

add this method

public void FollowNpcCB(int NPCID, int enemyID) { int playerX = server.npcHandler.npcs[enemyID].absX; int playerY = server.npcHandler.npcs[enemyID].absY; if (npcs[enemyID] != null) { if (npcs[NPCID].IsDead == false && npcs[enemyID].IsDead == false) { if (playerY < npcs[NPCID].absY) { npcs[NPCID].moveX = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absX, playerX); npcs[NPCID].moveY = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absY, playerY + 1); } else if (playerY > npcs[NPCID].absY) { npcs[NPCID].moveX = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absX, playerX); npcs[NPCID].moveY = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absY, playerY - 1); } else if (playerX < npcs[NPCID].absX) { npcs[NPCID].moveX = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absX, playerX + 1); npcs[NPCID].moveY = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absY, playerY); } else if (playerX > npcs[NPCID].absX) { npcs[NPCID].moveX = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absX, playerX - 1); npcs[NPCID].moveY = GetMove(npcs[NPCID].absY, playerY); } npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].getNextNPCMovement(); } } }
its makes the attacker walk to the npc being attacked
  1. Now replace your boolean attacknpc
    with this one
public boolean AttackNPC(int NPCID) { for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) { if (NPCID < 0) return false; if (npcs[NPCID] != null) { if (npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc] != null) { int attacknpc = npcs[NPCID].attacknpc; int EnemyX = npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = npcs[attacknpc].absY; int EnemyHP = npcs[attacknpc].HP; int hitDiff = misc.random(npcs[NPCID].MaxHP / 8); FollowNpcCB(NPCID, attacknpc); npcs[NPCID].faceNPC(attacknpc); 
            if (npcs[NPCID].actionTimer == 0) {
                if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1)) {
                    if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].IsDead == true) {
                        ResetAttackNPC(NPCID);
                    } else {

                        npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 451;
                        npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;

                        if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
                            hitDiff = EnemyHP;
                        }
                        if (misc.random(2) != 2) hitDiff = 0;
                        npcs[attacknpc].gethurt(hitDiff);
                        npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 7;
                        return true;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
  }
    return false;
}</blockquote>

5)replace your resetnpcattack method with this

public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { npcs[NPCID].IsUnderAttackNpc = false; npcs[NPCID].IsAttackingNPC = false; npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = true; return true; }

6)in process
find something like this

for (int i = 0; i < maxNPCs; i++) { if (npcs[i] != null) { if (npcs[i].actionTimer > 0) { npcs[i].actionTimer--; }
under the } add this
if (npcs[i].IsAttackingNPC && !npcs[i].fighting) { int npcType = npcs[i].npcType; if (npcType == 9) AttackNPC(19); } if (npcs[i].npcType == 19 && !npcs[i].fighting) { npcs[i].IsAttackingNPC = true; npcs[i].attacknpc = 9; npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; AttackNPC(i); } else { ResetAttackNPC(i); }
it just attacks the void knight and stops when the void knight is dead

save and close…compile, autospawn some white knights and a void knight, and the white knights should come and attack the void knight

FAQ

  1. I want another monster to attack it, how do i do it?
    recker says:go back to process part and
if (npcs[i].IsAttackingNPC && !npcs[9].fighting) { int npcType = npcs[i].npcType; if (npcType == 19) AttackNPC(i); } if (npcs[i].npcType == #### && !npcs[i].fighting) { npcs[i].IsAttackingNPC = true; npcs[i].attacknpc = 9; npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; AttackNPC(i); } else { ResetAttackNPC(####); }
replace the #### with the npc id

like i said this is just a simple base of npc vs npc, im just releasing it to help.

[size=24pt]CREDITS:
Me 10% for modifying it and fitting it to an 317 czar where it can easily be converted
90% Creator of Dynasty- they built the code[/size]

any errors please pm me or comment below

an video of my guards attacking the void knight

Read full topic
